title.narrative: IN Karnataka Urban Water Supply Modernization Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to provide city-wide access to a continuous piped water supply in the eligible cities in the state of Karnataka, and to strengthen service delivery arrangements at the city level.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
Karnataka Urban Infrastructure Development & Finance Corporation (KUIDFC)

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement (Schedule 1, I A 9) :Government Order to facilitate the financial contribution by or on behalf of the EligibleCity | Due Date :31-Aug-2017

Finance Agreement (Schedule 1, I A 9): Transfer of SFC untied grants | Description :Transfer of an adequate amount of untied grantsfrom the SFC to the debt-service escrow account of the ULB in each Eligible City | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement (Schedule 2, 1-d): Karnataka to issue Government Orders and take other necessary legal steps to constitute a citywater utility in the form of an SPV owned by a ULB in each Eligible City in accordance with a schedule agreed with the Bank: | DueDate :10-Jul-2021 (Kalaburagi), 12-Jul-2021 (HD), and 15-Jul-2021 (Belagavi)

Project Agreement (Schedule 1, A 4) Karnataka shall ensure or shall cause KUIDFC or the ULB to ensure that suitable powers aredelegated to ULBs, KUIDFC, SPVs and the Project Operator within six months from the commencement of the start-up period of therelevant Operator Contract | Due Date : 10-Jan-2022 (Kalaburagi), 12-Jan-2022 (HD) and 15-Jan-2022 (Belagavi)
